title: Macbook 820-00426 no keyboard
message:
Clean board, tested with known good keyboard and the entire keyboard doesn't work.

FPC looks good, J4813 pin 4 3V42 and pin 30 PP3V3_S4 are both fine, U4830 area looks good.

title: Macbook 820-00426 no keyboard
message:
Did you try known good trackpad flex/board?
Be aware of chinese flex; I changed 3 to fix such problem one time.

title: Macbook 820-00426 no keyboard
message: Board was tested in a working/different case/mac

title: Macbook 820-00426 no keyboard
message:
Still the same problem?
KB doesn't work in boot menu, nor macOS?

Inspect U4820/30 adjacent resistors, traces and solders.
Check voltage and diode mode to ground on their SCL/SDA lines.

Just in case, check SMC_LID.
Be sure J4801 is good.

title: Macbook 820-00426 no keyboard
message:
U4820/30 adjacent resistors, traces and solders good, SCL/SDA lines voltage 3.3V diode OK compared to working board

SMC_LID 3.3V

J4801 looks like new

title: Macbook 820-00426 no keyboard
message:
Change both U4820/30, just in case.
Use donor board, maintain the positions.
